summary: A retexture and alternate look to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
The Alternatives series are retextures of key locations to give them a new look.



[color=red]For best results, it is highly recommend to install the following: [/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26126] No Stretching [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655/] Static Mesh Improvement Mod [/url]

Install my mods(s) afterward. Overwrite when prompted.

                                                                   --ooOOoo--

Latest version 1.4.
Retexture of Whiterun.  By default, roof color is brown.  These can be changed between Blue, Yellow or Brown as an optional download. Just overwrite files when prompted.




[b] [color=yellow]  My other Retextures:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9642]-- Alternatives Solitude --[/url] [/color] [/b]


=====================================================================================
                                            
                                          [color=yellow]    [b] Installation [/b]     [/color]           

 NMM install: 

[color=red] If installing a Add-On with NMM, , say NO to the upgrade, then YES to overwrite. [/color]
 Saying yes to the upgrade will un-install the main mod and upgrade to the add-on only.

Im unsure how to stop it from asking you to upgrade, but it seem to have something to do with the naming scheme.


Manual Installation:
Download and Extract the 7zip file.  Copy the DATA folder in the 7zip archive to your Skyrim main  directory.
 Same proceedure for Add-Ons.

Uninstall:  Delete the folder Whiterun located in the Steam directory at (Data/textures/architecture/ [b] WHITERUN [/b]

=====================================================================================

[color=yellow] Recommended Mods that go well with this: [/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8182]Pines of Whiterun[/url] by: Vallkyrie

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8677]Landscaped Breezehome[/url] by: ohiogramps


[u] [color=green] Credits: [/u]

 *  Krucify, for the use of Better Doors      
       Be sure to visit the Nexus page & give an endorse :)

  * Bethseda for a great game. [/color]
author: ZayLa
